La salle du restaurant est bruyante, en revanche le service était très agréable et efficace. 
Le volume de la musique du manège nous a paru excessif.
Nous étions en randonnée vélo et nous nous sommes sentis en décalage avec les autres usagers du camping. La nuit a été bruyante, jusqu'à presque 4 heures du matin (éclats de voix, départ de visiteurs en voiture...)
Ce camping est un des rares sur les circuits vélo du haut bocage, peut-être envisager une zone un peu plus à l'écart pour la tranquillité des randonneurs qui se couchent tôt pour se lever tôt ?

Avons passé une nuit en toile de tente, le lac à proximité du camping est superbe, nous pensions cependant trouver un endroit plutôt silencieux mais la musique du manège riverain est bien trop élevée. Sanitaires plutôt propres. Très bon accueil

name: Natural Area Camping pond Puy
comments: A very nice camping site next to a large lake. 5 mins from Puy du Fou. It has a club house with a bar and a collection of games for the kids. Also permanent tents for those that have no camping equipment.

Dommage un cadre superbe totalement gâché par un laisser aller affligeant. Le manque d'entretien des équipements  entraîne  une disponibilité réduite (2 sanitaires sur 5 d'ouvert) et peut même nuire à la sécurité (marches d'escaliers cassées ou absentes, dallage défoncé, banc cassé etc...) de plus une odeur d'égout pestilentielle flottait sur une partie du camping.
Si on rajoute à ce triste tableau  la propriétaire qui fait la gueule on est content quand on part

Ce n'est pas cher mais cela ne vaut pas plus
Petit camping calme et reposant après une journée fatigante passée au Puy du Fou. Accueil chaleureux. Grands emplacements. Sanitaires neufs et bien entretenus. Bon rapport qualité-prix.

Accueil agréable, sanitaires propre. À 6 minutes du Puy du fou. 
Un emplacement pour une nuit à partir de 8 euros.

Je pourrai passer la journée à donner les défauts de ce camping ! Les gérants de moque complétement de l'entretien de leur air ! Il se moque complètement de nous ils n'entretiennent rien car ils savent que ce sera louer dans tous les cas ! (Grâce au Puy du fou) . 

Les sanitaires sale , l'eau froide , une douche innondé pendant une semaine entière sans qu'elle ne fasse rien ! Un robinet cassé alors qu'il n'y avait déjà que très peu de robinet pour la vaisselle (robinet sans aucun débit d'eau je précise).

Quand nous sommes arrivé dans notre emplacement il était très très sale ! Le matelas remplis de poussière et de saleté ! L'inventaire était totalement incomplet il manquait 1 quart de l'inventaire.

Il n'y avait plus de bombonne de gaz pour le réchaud heureusement elle nous a donné une grosse bouteille à gaz , je précise quand même qu'elle a dit qu'elle avait oublié d'acheter des bombonnes de gaz alors que le camping était presque complet ! 

Les tantes sont envahi pour les souris qui rentre à l'intérieur et qui font des trous partout sur le sol ! Elle font un bruit sourd à gratter sur la tante !

L'accès au douche handicapé sont.... Inaccessible aux handicapés !!! Même nous c'est compliqué d'y accéder car il y a une très grande marche à monter pour y aller !! C'est quand même incroyable de ne pas pouvoir accéder à une douche handicapé lorsque notre mobilité est réduite !!

Il y a quand même des points positifs , comme le belle étang où l'on peut se promener et pêcher avec tranquillité. Il y aussi le bar de l'accueil qui est a des prix abordables. C'est un espace idéale pour les chiens.

Mais en conclusions je dirai que c'est un camping à éviter et que même si vous allez au Puy du fou essayer de prendre un autre camping ! Cette aire ne pourra jamais être amélioré car la proprio s'en fou complétement de l'entretien de son aire.

name: Camping Sandpiper
comments:
Valt zwaar tegen.
Plaatsen zijn zeer klein.
Op de website staat 120 m2, dit is het echt niet.
We hebben op plaatsen met minder dan 100 m2 gestaan en die waren vele malen groter.
De voortent konden we niet goed plaatsen en de luifel konden we al helemaal niet plaatsen.
Doordat het voorste gedeelte van klinkers voorzien is.
Als dit nu eens het gedeelte was geweest waar de caravan op stond!

De plek was erg modderig, we hadden de slechste plek. Al helemaal als het regende.

Douchen 1 euro voor amper 4 minuten. Andere campings vragen hier 50 cent voor.

2 douches en 2 toiletten per geslacht.

Te duur voor wat je geboden krijgt.

Helaas eens maar niet weer.
Wir hatten ein Mobilheim für 5tage gebucht. Sehr gepflegte Anlage. In ca. 15min. Ist man Fußläufig am Strand. Läden des täglichen Bedarfs in wenigen Minuten, mit dem Rad, zu erreichen...

Kleine plaatsen, erg modderig, weinig sanitair. Verder geen voorzieningen. 
Erg duur voor de kleine plaatsen.
Zouden 100m2 zijn.
Ik heb plaataen van 80m2 gezien die groter waren.
Zu laut. Zu viele Hunde. Nichts für Leute die Ruhe suchen. Sauber und gut gepflegt.

Wir waren auf einem der beiden Übernachtungsplätzen für Wohnmobile.
Service war freundlich und gut. Sanitätereinrichtungen waren sauber und in Ordnung. Kinderanimation war direkt vor unserem Stellplatz und schien ganz gut zu sein. Da wir aber ohne Kids unterwegs waren, ist das nur subjektiv. Alles in Allem aber als Campingplatz zu empfehlen.

name: Camping Capfun
comments:
We stayed during August 2017, originally booked for 12 nights but only got through 6 before leaving.

Our issues started from the moment we arrived. The pitch we were originally assigned wasn't particularly big (maybe 80 sqm) and a strange shape, but it would have been fine if it had a power supply within 30m of the pitch. We had 20m of cable and were nowhere close. Also, the lead would run across an access road which I didn't think was particularly safe. The other issue was the main entertainment marquee was 50m away. We didn't know at this time that this would be a problem, but because of the power supply issue we moved pitches to one we were a lot happier with.

Getting back to the entertainment, this is all in French, including the what's on for the week, and also can go on very late into the night. Whilst the campsite should be quiet by 11pm, the entertainment when we stayed went on past this time on the 4 nights it ran, and one night went on well past midnight. Also, there was a considerable language barrier in the bar, making ordering something quite difficult. You need to be aware of  this as it's not anywhere near as multi lingual as other campsites. That said, this was only a minor annoyance to us.

There was also a security issue in our opinion. The main play area for the children bordered the path by the lake, with a handy gate which appeared to be left open all of the time. Once more, the fence had been pushed down further along. This meant that access into the campsite was easier, or kids getting onto the lake was easy as well. On the plus side, the lake smelt and had high levels of bright green algae so this was not an attractive option for the kids, so they probably wouldn't have wondered in.

Finally, the pools. This was more of a disappointment as younger children have very few options, and the kiddie waterslides both has considerable drops from them into shallow water. On one occasion the indoor pool water level was lowered and the drop from the slide was actually into 2cm of water. For onlder kids this is not an issue and it must be said that the water slides are very good, and the indoor/outdoor pools were good.

So, to summarise, you need to speak French to really enjoy yourself here, don't have young children, the entertainment goes on quite late and the lake smells.

Now we knew it would be loud, but this is a joke. We wanted fun for the kids, not for them to damage their hearing. It's absolutely hideous. Unless you enjoy trying to sleep in a nightclub, avoid this place. I can hardly hear myself crying over the music.

Bij aankomst een iemand bij de receptie die een half woord Engels praat, met handen en voeten en een half woordje frans toch eindelijk bij onze plek gekomen.
Wij waren met twee kleine kinderen van 7 en 9. Aangezien er ook een animatie team aanwezig was dachten wij voor elkaar. Alleen deze praten ook alleen Frans en niemand die de moeite doet om de kinderen tegemoet te komen.....dus dat werdt hem ook niet.
Toen maar een hapje eten bestelt bij de snackbar op de camping en aangegeven dat wij het daar op wilden eten. Toen mensen naast ons "Fransen" hun eten kregen terwijl ze tien minuten later dan ons aankwamen, toch maar even gevraagd waar ons eten bleef.
De dame achter de bar wees naar een paar borden op de bar die er al een tijd stonden en koud waren???? Na veel moeite toch opnieuw een warm bordje eten gekregen....die we dan ook zelf maar bij de bar op moesten halen.
Later op de week 12€ af moeten rekenen voor een pizza van 8€??? Ook hier doen ze net of het aan jouw ligt.
Plek voor de tent is ook erg smal waardoor je de tent in de lengte moet zetten en er dan bijna geen leef ruimte er om heen is.
Hele camping voornamelijk Fransen en er wordt totaal geen rekening met "buitenlanders" gehouden. Al met al eens maar nooit meer. Nationalistisch  volk wat er rond loopt. Elke avond tot een uur of 1 keiharde Franse muziek en luidruchtig volk over de camping, tot onze grote verbazing sluiten de poorten niet 's Avonds en rijden er 's nachts ook gewoon auto's over het terrein. Aan de achter kant van de camping zit een poort maar die staat ook de hele nacht open waardoor iedereen maar op het terrein kan.
Al met al ook heen fijn gevoel.
Tot slot nog de badmeesters die ook alleen Frans praten en eigenlijk meer in het zonnetje liggen dan opletten. Als er dan iets gebeurt dan kan je jezelf niet eens verdedigen en trek je altijd aan het kortste eind. Bv. Toen mijn zoontje een trap van een Frans jongetje kreeg en hij dit terug deed moest mijn zoon het zwembad uit en het andere jongetje mocht  gewoon blijven zwemmen, nou sorry hoor toen was ik er klaar mee. Kan aan mij liggen dat ik niet vloeiend Frans praat maar ik heb m'n best gedaan.....🙁😠.
Au revoir.

Super camping lorsque vous avez de jeunes enfants. Les animations et les jeux sont nombreux. Le parc aquatique est très bien. Un bon rapport qualité/prix pour les pizzas.
Ce message est particulièrement adressé à Bruno qui a fait tous ses efforts pour retrouver une prothèse d'oreille perdue dans les toboggans.

Camping 2 étoiles, en fait. Équipements tout le temps en panne (lave linge). Camping non sécurisé ouvert aux quatre vents de jour comme de nuit. On est rentré une nuit à 1h du mat, sans code, ni barrière. Animateurs et barmen peu souriants, limite froids. Consommations hors de prix (25cl de bière 4€20, plats 14 €)

name: Camping du Lac
location: 39 Route du Val Rétif, 85700 Pouzauges, France
comments: Camping trop calme cependant le lac est sympa et on px y faire le tour lors d une ballade en amoureux ou en famille
Super camping ! Calme et reposant !
Camping calme

name: Camping 't Oude Dorp
comments: Een rustige camping waar je echt tot rust kan komen. vriendelijk personeel en lekker eten.

Wünderschöne, sehr gepflegte Freizeitanlage mit Pool und Kinderbecken , mit  Bistro und kleinem Restaurant. 
Unter sehr netter Leitung. Direkt, nur durch eine Treppe mit dem Meer/ Wasser verbunden. 
Unter sehr netter Leitung. Immer freundlich und hilfsbereit. Bin sehr gerne dort😃
Een rustige camping aan de kust. Het ligt aan de dijk en licht in een prachtig natuurgebied.
Schöner gemütlicher Platz. Sehr für Kinder zu empfehlen
Все работает  отлично,но иногда (редко очень)гдючит

name: camping Les Portes de la Loire
comments: Best avoided. Scruffy site squashed between river and busy road with nothing to recommend it. Basic unisex facilities with plenty of cobwebs.  Certainly doesn't justify the price.
OK

camping  sur les bords de loire oui , mais surtout sur le bord d'une route tres fréquentée .
Camping beaucoup trop bruyant ...

Disponibilité Écoute et conseils d'orientation pour les trajets 
Quelques attentions pour les cyclistes (local pour vélos)
Le centre ville est proche
L'essentiel est à disposition mais il faut monter des marches pour les toilettes ...
La proximité de la route peut se révéler gênante alors que le lieu invite à la rêverie
Très bruyant malgré le cadre agréable. Dommage.

name: Camping Palazuelo
location: Carretera Mayorga Astorga, Km. 30, 24234 Villamañán, León, Spain
comments: La antítesis del concepto camping. Una zona de acampada dejada y con déficit en el mantenimiento. La piscina compartida con el hostal bien. El control de acceso nulo. La limpieza en general deja mucho que desear. Una pena. No creo que vuelva.

Ya estuve muchas veces pero esta ultima creo que sera la ultima. Fuimos a censr a la terraza del bar y la camarera nos llamo para entrar al bar a coger la cena. Los baños cada dia peor y mas sucios. Duchas con agua templada fria. Bar sin futbol
Una pena de camping

Le doy 1 estrella por poner un comentario, tantas cosas que decir, al entrar en recepción el trato malo ya que nos obliga a llevar una pulsera naranja fosforito que no te puedes quitar en toda la estancia ni para salir del camping como si de un todo incluido se trarara, ojo si la pierdes te cobra 3€ por otra.
Seguridad del camping nula ya que el guarda brilla por su ausencia, respecto a los baños ASQUEROSOS tanto mujeres como hombres 10 baños cagados y 1 averiados, ni papel ni jabón de manos y las duchas el agua templada tirando a fría. El estado de los lavaderos y los fregaderos pésimos estan abandonados completamente.
El terreno del interior del camping necesita un asfaltado urgente, las parcelas algunas tienen buen cesped otras un secarral, pocas sombras. La piscina la abren el dia que les parece alegando que hace aire o cualquier otra excusa .Ibamos por 4 días y nos fuimos al dia siguiente,  no lo recomiendo para nada.
Claramente un lugar al que no volveré.
Un hostal fabuloso. Buen trato, comida buena y habitaciones acogedoras y limpias. Piscina grande perfecta. Para volver a repetir. Fantástico.
Camping familial propre personnel sympathique. Pour un 19juillet 17euros 2 adultes une tente une voiture. Honnêtement y a rien à dire.

name: Camping La Joletière 3* Mervent
comments: Good location. Pool

Camping bien à part que les patrons savent pas géré les emplacements et quand on leur dit que l on risque de faire du bruit avec 10 personnes , on nous installe un couple de vieux 50 ans environ et que ce couple nous dit de baisser d un ton alors qu'il est que 21h 30 faut pas exagérer et aussi Kon nous met tout  sur le dos ç est fort alors que le camping était plein de jeunes

camping calme - propre - emplacements de bonne taille bien délimités par des haies - propriétaires très sympa et disponibles - animations et repas entre campeurs simples et agréables - proche du village et de beaucoup de sites à visiter -  le mer est  facile d'accès

Camping familial avec piscine couverte et chauffe. Situe idealement a 1h du bord de mer mais aussi a 45mn du Puy du fou et 1h du Futuroscope. La foret de Mervent est un terrain ideal pour les fan de Vtt et la base de loisir permet de faire du canoe kawak paddle bateau electrique. Excellent sejour au camping, l ambiance est detendu et conviviale, les patrons tres sympa.
Je recommande vivement aux familles.
Au calme. Propre. Piscine agréable.  Très bon accueil.  Ne pas hésiter

name: Coop Ver Caravanpark Sirjansland UA
comments: Iets te rustig, niet veel te doen voor kinderen. Niet dichtbij een strand. Wel netjes onderhouden.
Een lang weekend lekker tot rust gekomen.
Sehr schöne gepflegte Anlage auf Genossenschaftsbasis. Kostengünstig und ideal für Familien.
Fijne mooie caravan vereniging
Lekker plekkie hoor 😊

name: DCU-Camping Ejsing Strand
comments: Nice get away from the city. Flea markets on Saturday's. 2km there is football golf.

Rigtig fin campingplads i rolige omgivelser.
Det var et plus at vi fandt ud af at de 3 gange om ugen havde en lille gril åben og at vi var heldige at ramme den ene aften. Og maden smagte godt og blev serveret med et smil samt vand til vores hunde. En super god oplevelse.
Rolig campingplads, kan dog godt trænge til en kærlig hånd, men alt i alt okay.
Dejligt plads manglende vedligeholdelse af baderum
Hyggelig og rolig campingplads. Lidt nedslidte servicebygninger, men funktionelt.

name: Camping Magnet
comments: Kom je lekker tot rust
Rustige camping, het beheer kan echter beter

name: Ardoer camping Ginsterveld
comments: Very nice and relax camping you have clean  bathroom, there is a place for children to play, you can do barbecue, and you have near the beach
Relaxed
Great Ardoer camping, especially for Dutch and German families. Clean modern facilities, well-organised staff. Just loved our 2-week stay!

Niet veel aan plekken  zijn met heg omheind en niet gewoon gezellig bij elkaar er zit geen hond on de kantine  word ook weinig gedaan  1 x per 3 weken  een bingo en dat is het  het zwembad  is wel leuk eens maar nooit meer
Erg kindvriendelijke camping met alle faciliteiten. Ons gezin met 2 (lagere school)kinderen komt hier al enkele jaren en we blijven tevreden terugkomen.

name: Aalestrup Campingplads
comments: Det er jeg bare
Fantastisk legeplads til både børn og voksne

name: Løkken By Camping
comments: Pænt store pladser, særligt i forhold til sydeuropa! Meget roligt der hvor vi var. Fine baderum/toiletter (m/k-rum). Helt ok pris i forhold til at det var forsæson. Fint med aflåsning fra kl. 22 (kan dog åbnes med kort)
Løkken er bare så fint kort vei til by og strand
Pæn ren campingplads.  Ligger perfekt.  Lidt gamle faciliteter mht bad og toilet. Helt sikkert et besøg værd.
Sentralt og fint
Hyggelig sted😁

name: Camping Belle Rivière
comments: We want to Stay one night, we went to the reception as the indications and the two ladies on the reception refuse to attend us, they were in time lunch. They ask us to wait in the parking. For more of 20 years of camping this was awesome !!!!
Good access to Nantes via the river cycle path - approx 5 miles.  Good toilets and other amenities and big play area.
Beautiful little campsite, comfortable and clean.  Very friendly family owned campsite that welcomes cyclists.
Wow. One of the cleanest camping I've stayed. Great environment  for kids. 3 days 2 night stay. No complaints.

This site is excellent! The welcome is warm and inviting. The staff are very friendly and helpful. The facilities are excellent and very clean. The site is beautiful and peaceful even when more people were here at the beginning of the week. Brilliant place to stay as a couple as were are but for families too or solo. Excellent cycle route into Nantes.  We have even decided to stay another night. 5 stars is an understatement! Would most definitely stay again! Thank you belle rivière!

name: Camping de la Motte
comments: Pool and waterslide, great for the kids, easily accessible from the main road, without being noisy. Good activities here as well.

De camping zelf is goed, schoon en verzorgt. 

Na de eerste nacht bij hun gegeten, eten was ver onder de maat, ze moeten zich schamen om het te serveren. Ziek geworden zelfs van het eten. 

Tussen het overgeven door, kwamen twee dames verhaal halen, hoe wij durfden een slechte recensie over hun eten te geven. Ze wilden dat wij per direct zouden vertrekken. 

De volgende 2 dagen werd er niet meer normaal tegen ons gepraat of normaal gedrag vertoond. 
Niet eens gevraagd of ik opgeknapt was na dit gebeuren. 
Ze moeten zich echt schamen. 

Walgelijke uitbaters!!! NOOIT MEER. Voor geen goud in de wereld!!!!!!

Sansan, wij drinken geen alcohol. 😂😂😂
Lieu super agréable aussi bien pour nous que pour les enfants. Une piscine super. Des animations tout les jours et l équipe est formidable. Je conseille ce camping à tous .

C'est un camping très familiale ou on peu etre tranquille avec des enfants. Nous sommes très bien accueilli.c'est un camping très propre, de plus on arrive quand et repart comme on veut. Sa c'est un avantage.

Très  agréable séjour  dans ce camping d'une propreté  irréprochable  avec un accueil très chaleureux. 
Je le recommande.

name: Løkken Familiecamping
comments: Fin og rolig plass . Trekker litt ned pga gammal toalett bygning.
Intet med familie camping at gøre. Det er en campingplads for ældre uden børn
Freundliche Leute  saubere anlage
God camping plads tæt på byen
Fina stugor, lite dyra. Ganska nära stranden. Tips: kör ner på stranden med bilen och bada. Fräscht och rent. Bra utrustat kök i deluxe stugorna. Løkken är en fin  by med många bra restauranger.

name: Flyndersø Campingplads
comments: Smukt beliggende campingplads ved flotte Flyndersø. Venligt og serviceminded personale. Traditionel fastlæggerplads med mange faste kunder, der ofte opholder sig ved kioskområdet, hvor man kan købe mad og drikke. Nogle pladser ligger tæt på Herningvejen med meget trafik. Lidt slidte bygninger og faciliteter opvejes af venlige gæster og personale.
Et dejlig og roligt sted med en masse natur
Dejlig bette hyggeligt sted. 👍👍👍
En rigtig god sted at camperer. De bedste værtspar vi har mødt. Dejlig legeplads for børn.
Det ligger rigtigt godt placeret i forhold til at komme ud og gå på heden og omkring Flyndersø

name: Nibe Camping - Sølyst at Aalborg / Bed and Breakfast
comments: Bravo

Meget flot, Elsker de små hyggelige huse man kan leje.
Der er gode forhold til campingvogne da der er massere græspladser hvor der er meget plads. Swimmingpoolen er sjov men den er fyldt med fuglelort, jord og døde insekter. Jeg har givet 3 stjerner pga. Internettet. 
Det koster 40 kr. Om dagen for at være på internettet, og der er kun ÉN der kan være på internettet af gangen, så intet med at hele familien har internet.

Perhe (aikuiset ja 3- ja 7-vuotta) asuntovanulla. Isot leiriytymispaikat joista osa pensasaidoilla rajattuja. Järven rannassa, jossa emme käyneet uimassa. Allas-alue joka vapaassa käytössä (lasten allas, isompi allas ja vesiliukumäki). Allasalue hieman vanhempi, mutta altaat uimakelpoiset. Perhesuihkuja. Yleiset tilat siistissä kunnossa. Rauhallinen alue, lähellä Niben pieni keskusta-alue.
I swimmingpoolen var der jord og var mega kolde men kunne ellers godt lide campingpladsen * * * *
God plads ren og pæn

name: Camping Rouge Gorge
location: Route de la Verrie, 85290 Saint-Laurent-sur-Sèvre, France
comments: Very clean and tidy site. Owners most helpful. Handy for Puy du Fou. Lovely médiéval town within walking distance.
Top

Un camping propre agréable et entouré d'une multitude de lieux a découvrir et à visiter. 
Piscine et jacuzzi bien plaisants!
Si vous passez dans les parages n'hésitez pas à y faire escale
Très bien. Personnel sympathique. Piscine et jacuzzi très propres
Bof. Responsable du camping peu aimable.  Petite ville de caractère

name: Camping l'Ambois
comments: Very helpfull english speaking staff. Clean facilities, with nice showers, but unfortunately no chemical toilet disposal (which didn't really matter to us as we only stayed 1 night). There are animals on site, incuding  goats (with baby goats), a lama, ponies & rabbits, which you are able go in with & touch/feed etc. There is a small under cover swimming pool with jacuzzi.  We participated in a friendly boules match, which was fun & there was a disco & karaoke in the evening which unfortunately had to be cancelled because the dj was sick.

Vraiment un séjours très authentique..au milieux des animaux , les propriétaire très ouverts et abordable un accueil formidable avec un cadeaux surprise à l'arrivée. Belle découverte pour nous!!! La propreté rien à redire, très rare pour beaucoup de camping...un petit bémol pour la piscine couverte qui ne l'est que partiellement un peut gênent dans une régions où le vent et au rendez vous et le jacuzzi trop froid c'est plutôt un bain à bulle ....disponibilité au top de l'accueil , et activité tous les soir jusqu'à 20H

Lieu extraordinaire, attrayant.
Parfait pour une famille avec des enfants.  Camping qui donne avec ses divers annimaux beaucoup de joie pour les enfants et les parents 
Lieu que je conseille vivement car idéal pour les enfants avec  ses nombreux parcs de jeux!!!et parcs annimaliers!!!
splendeur à l'état pur.
👍👍👍parfait!✌✌✌

Notre fille a adoré son séjour dans cet endroit (animaux, activités, piscine) et ne voulait pas repartir. Lieu agréable, un peu froid peut-être dès que la température baisse (la nuit). Proche de tout, équipe sympathique.
Camping intéressant certes,  mais beaucoup trop cher pour le randonneur qui vient planter sa tente le soir et repart de bonne heure le lendemain.

name: Ertebølle Strand Camping
comments: Largest ice creams, tasty morning rolls, fresh locally produced vegetables, lots of information, great outdoor playground for the kids... And nice people running it all.
Hyggelig Campingplads for både store og små. De sødeste Campingmutter og fatter :-)

Dejligt sted med skønne mennesker 
God service og fantastisk natur
En rigtig lækker gammeldags is man altid får hos jer :-)

Rigtig hyggelig campingplads, ikke for stor.
Dejlig natur med en masse frisk luft.

name: Camping Julianahoeve
comments:
Great familycamping site in Renesse, just a 10 min walk away from the beach, with everything you need, restaurant, brasserie, snackbar, pizzeria, supermarket and lots more!

They have a fantastic animation program, at the height of the season there's parties  almost every night, with occasionally live music. 

Definitely worth your hard earned money!
Top
Supercamping!

Toll, wenn man mit seinen Kindern dort Urlaub macht.
Alles ist sehr kinderfreundlich, das Personal ist sehr nett und der Campingplatz sauber, gepflegt und ruhig.
Auf dem Campingplatz selber gibt es für die Kinder ein Kino, Bastel- und Spielprogramme und mehrere tolle Spielplätze. Abends ist Unterhaltung für die ganze Familie angesagt, wenn man keine Lust auf Fernsehen im Mobilheim hat.
Ein Café und ein Supermarkt mit gratis Kaffee gibt es auch - herrlich, wenn man morgens dort hin läuft, um sich Brötchen zu holen und auf dem Rückweg schon mal einen Kaffee trinken kann.
Bis zum Strand braucht man mit Fahrrad und zu Fuß - die letzten Stücke zum Strand sind immer nur ohne Rad zu erreichen - keine 10 Minuten. 
Empfehlenswert, wenn man seine Ruhe an einem breiten Strand genießen oder auch Drachensport betreiben will, sind die etwas weiter entfernten Strandaufgänge. 
Renesse ist mit dem Fahrrad gut zu erreichen.

Super Platz. Personal unglaublich freundlich und hilfsbereit. Es wurde viel investiert, gerade im Bereich Kinder.
Platz ist sehr gepflegt. Toller Strand um die Ecke. Viele gute Fahrradwege.

name: Bramslev Bakker Camping
comments: Wonderful visit at Bramslev Bakker Camping. Clean and luxurious facilities. Great surroundings at the Marriager Fjord. And a wonderful company of friendly Danes including the sympatetic and helpful owner. 5/5!
Wie in der Beschreibung ruhig, familiär ... zwar kein WLAN aber trotzdem sehr schön.
Rolig plads med fantastisk beliggenhed. Rengøring og vedligeholdelse er helt i top. Værten ligeså 👌.
Det er bare ok
Dejlig Campingplads og super skøn natur.

name: Svinkløv Camping
comments: Beautiful place in the middle of nature for an active holiday. We use this place to discover the great local mountainbike-trails. On the campsite you have all facilities and they are very clean and modern. Bike-Rental is possible.

Wonderful camping site close to the ocean. We visited in late June and it felt like low season, not many other visitors and basically no families with children (except for mine and one or two other). There were two playgrounds, one with trampoline and a big air cushion and the other one with a wooden mini fortress. My children age 6 and 4 enjoyed them at least. The facilities are very well cleaned and of good standard. The shoreline is fantastic and the view is amazing.
Great place. Sea, sand, stones and nature and very little tourist

Sehr schöner Platz, hier stimmt alles. Eigentlich möchte man ihn gar nicht anpreisen, sonst kommen am Ende so viele, dass der Zauber darunter leidet. Für Familien, Camper, Radfahrer und Wanderer wunderbar. In einem Wald auf einem Hügel, wo gibt's das schon in Dänemark, über dem Meer. Die Aussicht über die ganze Jammerbucht wussten schon die Konstrukteure des Atlantikwalls zu schätzen.

Einer der schönsten Campingplätze auf denen wir waren. Eigentlich sollte man für diesen Platz keine guten Bewertungen abgeben, da man sonst vielleicht selbst keinen Platz mehr bekommt. ;-) Sehr freundliche Betreiber, sanitäre Anlagen sind zu jeder Zeit in einem top Zustand, der Platz liegt inmitten der Natur und fühlt sich zu keinem Zeitpunkt überfüllt an. Strand in unmittelbarer Nähe ist kilometerlang. Auch in den Dünen kann man stundenlang, mit Blick aufs Meer, wandern. Ich kann nur eins sagen: Jederzeit wieder

name: Lokken Klit Camping
comments: Nice place to camp. Alcoved places separated by hedges so you get some privacy. Many nice playgrounds for the kids and a new service building.
God Service
Hyggelig campingplads tæt ved Løkken by

Ein wunderschöner Campingplatz mit Strom, Frischwasser und Abwasser anschluss an jedem platz. Am besten hat uns das badeland gefallen, dass wasser war schön angenehm warm und die rutsche hat uns mega spaß gebracht. Allgemein wirkte der platz sehr modern, wobei die schrankenanlage auch eine kennzeichenerkennung hat und sich automatisch öffnet. Leider fehlen an einigen plätzen die Platznummern, dadurch konnten wir nicht auf anhieb unseren platz finden, darum ein stern abzug. Ansonsten ein wunderschöner platz zum Wohlfühlen.
Den har det hele, det er rent på toiletterne, der er badeland og legepladser. Men skal ikke langt efter vand og meget af pladsen er asfalteret.

name: Vammen Camping
comments: Very cosy camping ground... Seeemingly attracts a lot of mucians who make a lot of music in the shared atrium which is also home of a nice indoor camp fire. Germams, Danes, Swedes and Noewegians frequents the place. Free wifi, showers and cooking facilities when day price is paid.
Beautiful view of the lake, cozy common room
It's amazing

En utrolig hyggelig plads, som oser af hygge og overskud samt af gode tiltag i form af aftenhygge.
Pladsen ligger i en enestående natur, som giver lyst til længere gå-ture for alle aldre.
Kan varmt anbefales. ; )

Bin für 1 Nacht hier gewesen. Wunderschöner, abseits gelegener Campingplatz. Auf Terassen aufgebauter Platz an einem langgestreckten See. Am kleinen Strand liegen, Bademöglichkeit, mit dem 🛶 fahren. Familienbetrieb. Sehr ruhig. Kinderfreundlich. Musikalische, unterhaltsame Grill/Lagerfeuerabende, wo jeder was Beitragen kann. Morgens frische, selbsgebackene Brötchen. Radwanderungen und Spaziergänge werden mitorganisiert.
Der richtige gemütliche Platz zum Relaxen für junggebliebene "Hippies"

name: Skive Fjord Camping
comments: Beautiful campsite, we had a perfect view at the fjord. Nice pool and the service building was complete and clean. We had a wonderful time here!!
It was great there were friendly and the bath and pule was free :)
Kjempeplass som vi kommer tilbake til. Fint sanitæranlegg ryddig og fin plass med mange fine utsiktsplasser. Anbefales :)

Veldig fin og rolig campingplass til en rimelig pris. Vennlig betjening og ikke minst rene og fine sanitærforhold. Grei sykkelvei inn til sentrum ca 10min.
Vi kommer igjen😊
En dejlig passet etage plads. God udsigt for de fleste enheder. Toilet og køkken er rene og pæne. Og værtsparret er flinke og serviceminded. Helt sikkert et besøg værd.

name: DCU Camping Skovly-Tranum, Brovst
comments: Skønt og  dejlig sted med pæne rene faciliteter og imødekommende værts par .🍀🌞☉😊
Ganske fin plads. Hyggeligt tema for ungerne, med indianer. Lidt skrappe sedler overalt, med ting der er forbudt, og ting man ikke må. Det kan måske skrives mere i imødekommende.
Fin lille campingplads, har hvad der skal være. Minus at aktiviteterne til børnene er fra kl 19, kunne man ligge tidligere eksempel kl 14
Et Dejligt sted at komme et dejligt sted at være 😁😁
Skønt og dejligt sted 😎🤗😚

name: FUR Camping - Raakilde Lejrskole
comments: Et rigtigt fint telt vi leje MEN vi valgte at spise der første aften og det blev os sidste gang. Vi sad 15 min og ventede bare på og får lov til at bestille og derefter ventede vi 45 min på maden. Og det er AD FOR LANG tid for en familien. Maden var god.

Es ist definitiv kein Platz für ein Wohnmobil...eher zum Zelten und für kleinere Wohnwagen. Nur bei gutem Wetter zu benutzen, da der Boden das Wasser kaum aufnimmt und somit durch die Hanglage sehr gefährlich wird. Die Hütten machen auch einen traurigen Eindruck. Die Sanitäreinrichtung ist so lala. Auch die Infrastruktur zum Platz ist sehr schlecht. Sehr schade für so eine schöne Insel!
Et dejligt sted, uheldigt at pladserne er ujævne og telt aldrig kommer til at stå lige.
Fantastisk natur, dejlige mennesker, god restaurant
Skøn Campingplads. Fantastisk udsigt og god service. Ny toiletbygning og køkkenfaciliteter. Hoppepude og legeplads til børn.

name: Hobro Camping Gattenborg
comments: Best camping place on our trip through Denmark. Well maintained wash rooms with music! Beautiful playground for our kids - including a little zoo.

Veldig fin beliggenhet, nært byen og ikke langt borte fra en kort kjøretur til djurs sommerland eller Randers regnskov. 
Hyttene på 15 kvadratmeter var små, og blir gjerne litt for lite for 4 pers hvis en er vant med å ha bedre plass. Fin stor campingplass, med dyr inkl.geiter, kaniner og høner. Veldig koselig for de mindre. Det er også biljardbord, fotballspill og svømmebasseng. Anbefales!

Super unfreundlich zu Deutschen.Wir hatten vor dort zu übernachten. Ich war auf Toilette ehe wir eingecheckt haben. Dafür verlangte die chefin 20 Kronen mit der Bemerkung in Deutschland würde das immer was kosten. Das sind fast 3 Euro. Nach so einer Behandlung zogen wir es vor uns etwas anderes zu suchen.
Rigtig hyggelig lille campingplads, med gode faciliteter, og kort til byen.
Fin campingplads. Flotte naturstier.

name: Strandgaardens Camping
comments: Get place 99. No electricity though great views
Så er vi landet i Vorupør på camping
Fahre seit 14 Jahren hier hin, ist und bleibt super.
Wunderschöner Platz, nur die sanitären Anlagen dürften ein wenig erneuert werden.
Fantastisk plads lige ved havet🌞🤗👍

name: Hanstholm Camping
comments: Nice little bungalow, but not the warmest water in the showers. The curtains were quite old and stained and not thick enough. Was waking up from the sun quite early :(

Meines Erachtens einer der schlechtesten Stellplätze an der dänischen Nordsee.
Unfreundlicher Empfang.
Angebotener Brötchen Service hat nicht funktioniert,da wir angeblich keinen Zettel ausgefüllt haben.(Vortag Anreise mit Vorbestellung ausgefüllt).
Der ausgewiesene "Luxus Platz" entpuppte sich als bessere Wiese in Schräglage. Mit viel Rangieren und durch Nutzung sämtlicher Keile gab es eine leichte Schräglage.
Für diesen"Luxus Platz" darf man dann auch noch extra bezahlen. 
Frechheit!!!

Für die Zukunft machen wir einen großen Bogen um diesen Platz.

Besøgte pladsen i uge 33 i knap en uge. Hyggelig, men med meget få aktiviteter. Formentlig fordi det var uden for sæson, men der var stadig en del gæster. Campingpladsen lider lidt under at der ikke er mange interessante seværdigheder i området. Toilet og bade faciliteter var helt i top, og der er opsat store grill med godt med plads. Lille kiosk med basale varer, men ikke langt til Hanstholm by hvor der er flere forskellige supermarkeder. Swimmingpool med vandrutschebane, men ingen faciliteter til omklædning. Vi fik ikke besøgt pladsens egen restaurant.
Kan ikke sige så meget om hytterne, da vi lejede den mindste af dem, som kun har 1 seng og lille tekøkken. Den var ok, og var ikke beskidt eller noget.

Har tilbragt en uge i hytte på pladsen. Det gør vi ikke igen. Der er tvunget betaling for rengøring som sjal sikre, at man ankommer til en ren hytte. Der var ikke rent. Toilettet var fyldt med sort støv rundt om og på brættet. Der var kun afløb inde i selve brusenichen, hvilket efterlader uhyggelige tanker om, hvordan de mon kan vaske toilettet (toilet, håndvask, gulv) Alt service skulle vaskes af før brug. Bestikket og bestikskuffen måtte også vaskes.
Der var mærkelige pletter på væggene. 
Legepladserne var OK, men havde nogle småting, som krævede reperation. 
Det er ikke et sted vi kommer igen og jeg vil anbefale, at man afholder sig fra at leje en hytte der. Hvis vi var kommet i eget telt, havde vi nok givet 3 stjener.

Skønt sted ved Vesterhavet ... Minus var dårlig internet og defekte fjernsyn som ikke var blevet fjernet og som alligevel ikke skulle skiftes ud... Men hvem skal også bruge tv og internet når man er på camping 😉

name: Humlum Fishing Village & Camping
comments: Had a quick stroll. Good nature
Very clean. Beautiful view

Perfekt familie camping og rene og flotte omgivelser... Det er virkelig fokus på børn og campister med hunde.. daglige aktiviteter med børnene... Og så er der en hunde Ø,  hvor din hund kan løbe frit, og tumle i søer og i fjorden..Der er desuden indrettet hunde brusere.. Så den kan få et bad after en tur i fjorden..  fantastisk natur omgivelser.. Der er kiosk på selve pladsen med de mest nødvendige ting... Meget flink og rar ejer.. Og der er ikke så langt til havet... Kan virkelig anbefales.. Vi har Været på ferie der en uge, og vi vil helt sikkert være fasliggere de fremtidige år...

Denne campingplads oser af tilpashed. Det er en gennemført plads med tanke på det anvendelige.  Super hundevenlig luksus, med hundeweellness bad og egen ø, hvor de frit kan løbe rundt. 
Badefaciliteter er helt i top og til baby er der også tænkt på alt. 
Der er en venlig stemning og imødekommende campingpar, som driver pladsen.  Det var helt klart de over 2 timers kørsel værd for en dejlig weekend. 
Kommer helt sikkert igen. 😊
Super hyggelig plads, med rigtig gode sanitære forhold.

name: Hjarbæk Fjord Camping - Canoe, Camping, Playground
comments: Great service, the kids loved the pool the animals and everything... It was a cozy stay

Nice big playground with a few rabbits and goats to pet. Toilets were okay, albeit the shower water temperature was mediocre at best. 
Toilet facilities starting to show their age in general. 
Bar, kiosk and other services were closed so can't comment on that.
Flyers with bonuses for staying 4 days were handed out recently at a exhibition, sorry to say they couldn't follow up on the bonuses. So minus for that.
A few of the emplacements have a really good view.
Fine.
God campingplads☺☺☺☺
Utroligt smukt beliggende, og med Viborg lige rundt om hjørnet ( 10 km). Jeg elsker den her del af Jylland, som jeg synes er ret undervurderet.

banyak obyek wisata pantai dan pulau2 kecil disana dan masih terkesan alami, udaranya begitu bersih terbalut dengan angin gunung dan laut yang menyatu sehingga sehat untuk kehidupan masyarakat 
panoraman pantai yang menawan, air laut yg jernih menjadikan betah pengunjung yangbingin wisata atau pun menenangkan diri menyatu dengan alam

Tempat sangat Luas dan bisa untuk Meeting.
Udara yang cukup sejuk dengan pemandangan yang indah, membuat kita betah berlama-lama di lokasi.
Tempat masih belum tertata dengan baik, masih banyak kayu2 bekas berserakan. Beberapa gazebo masih diperbaiki. Beberapa spot bisa untuk foto dengan background gunung Muria.
Lumayan untuk wisat

name: Surf N Stay Strandhill Lodge, Hostel and Surf School
location: Shore Rd, Carrowbunnaun, Strandhill, Co. Sligo, Ireland
comments: Simple hostel very close to the sea. To common room is not very big and the kitchen too, but it's enough. Probably very good place for surfers, there is also a surfschool directly next to it.
Great location, clean and cheap

Great little hostel with personality. Staff changes relatively often, but they were great when I was there. Everything worked fine for me at the hostel. Kitchen, wifi, hot showers, pleasant beds. Great common areas. I had a good time in strandhill, give it a try! Haven't heard of it? That's a good thing. Be outgoing and you'll be rewarded.
Tea at the bus stop

I cannot fault this place. We arrived late and found they had their own parking...great! 2 of us stayed in the Lodge and it really was hotel standard accommodation. 2 of our friends stayed in the Hostel (Lodge was booked out) and it was great too! The place is just onto the beach so we couldn't resist trying out a surf lesson since they have a surf school on the premisies. That was a blast!! We'll definitely do that again. There is a shop, cafe, 2 pubs, restuarants all beside you so that really convenient. You could just kick back and relax. Even managed to squeeze in a seaweed bath (just around the corner on sea front) before we left. We'll be back soon for sure...

name: Campers Bundoran
location: Retail Park, Bundoran, Station Rd, Drumacrin, Bundoran, Co. Donegal, Ireland
comments:
Great place to stay at a affordable price,
This is a basic campers (motorhome and caravan only)with just the basics but can't expect anymore for the money you pay and the guy that runs it is very friendly

Ideal for visiting, town very central only 15 euro for electricity and water, immaculate showers that cost €2 for four minutes plenty of time to shower and toilets also immaculate,  the added advantage us you have supermarkets just a few steps away and splash world a short walk also from this
It was good for us, quiet. Nice showers, although dear. Car parking slopes. Fair price.
€15 just to park in car park...... PLUS............   €3 for shower the lasts about 90 seconds !!! Daylight Robbery !!!!!

name: Killybegs Holiday Park
comments: The owner is a lovely, very welcoming man . There are security gates in and out of the park and after that no keys or tokens are required for the toilets or showers which were immaculately kept. We paid €25 all inclusive  for a caravan with electricity hook up and unlimited showers. Drawback was that the pitches are on terraces cut into the side of a steep hill and covered in coarse stone. There is no grassy area. The view across to the lighthouse is very nice however. There is a lack of amenities such as a campers kitchen or washing / vending machines. However work is ongoing here and it has the potential to be a fantastic campsite with a little more work. We will visit again the next time we need a stop over on our way to northern Donegal. More suitable for fully equipped caravans or campers rather than a tent, beware of the very steep hill in and out!

Very friendly person, clean camping place, warm and clean showers. 
Very good camping site.
Perfect for a tent for one night.

Quiet campground with excellent view, good prices, clean bathrooms, free warm showers and wifi included.  
a great place to stay
Great view but that is it. Holiday park is not a good description very basic terrace site with new small toilet blocks. Would not return.
A great little spot with some great views.

name: Bayside Campers
location: W End, Magheracar, Bundoran, Co. Donegal, Ireland

name: Travers Holiday Park
location: Station Rd, Drumacrin, Bundoran, Co. Donegal, Ireland
comments: Great Park not very large but big enough. walking distance from everything,  The owners are just amazing so helpfull and  friendly . H
Very good well run and managed the owner Neil is always helpful and chatty
Great place. Well run. Very tidy. Central location.
Stayed here last night and had a very warm welcome from the owner Neil. The site is immaculate and reasonably priced. If you need a campsite I recommend you check this place out.
Beautiful site and so close to all restaurants shops etc xx

name: Teapot Lane Glamping
location: Teapot Lane, Mullanyduff, Tawley, Co. Leitrim, Ireland
comments: I went there with a group of ladies for my hen last year and we chose the pamper package. We had such a great time that on the way out we said see you next year. We are all just back from our second weekend there and we look forward to going again next year. Great place, great food, great people. I can't recommend Teapot lane enough.
Simply superb, a great host
Fantastic Hen Party Experience

Lieu agréable et vraiment très calme!

name: Beach Bar
location: Aughris head templeboy, Cartronofarry East, Sligo, Ireland
comments: Both the food and the service were good but not great.
Great spot for surfing, pub food and camping. Had a great stay.
For  me this  is  the  best  place  in  the  west  of  Ireland.  It  has  everything  you  need  for  a  day  away  with  the  family or on  your own ... just  go  and  see  for  yourself.
Lovely scenery, beer and food, top notch

name: Darty View Caravan Park
location: E End, Drumacrin, Bundoran, Co. Donegal, Ireland
comments: Fantastic park in a central location. Close to both the beach and all of the activities. Great for families!

name: Croagh Caravan Park
location: Croagh Caravan Park, Croagh, Dunkineely, Co. Donegal, Ireland
comments: Croagh is a beautiful well maintained Canaan park. It has great facilities like laundry and a above par playground. The only thing nicer than the outstanding views is the annual fees which are extremely reasonable. Donegal town and Killybegs is only a stone throw away. The only cloud in the sky, which to be honest isn't the caravan parks fault, is the narrow roads and the ridiculous speed limits in the immediate area. If you're looking for a caravan park in the north west of ireland then look no further.
Lovely scenery of donegal.. Quiet site
We had a great time over St Patricks weekend in Croagh caravan park. Very friendly people. Cant wait for Easter holidays to come until we go back to Donegal
Amazing place so far can't wait to explore more
Very quiet and out of the way, just what I like

name: Errigal View Pet Farm
comments:
Good selection of large and small animals and both indoor and outdoor activities. 
Well priced and great customer service. 
2 and 5 year olds both enjoyed themselves.

Just down the N56 from Gortahork is this wonderful place that all our grandchildren loved! from ages 2 1/2 to 12! Friendly place with all the animals and a place to have a coffe indoors with soft games for the younger ones. Today the 2 oldest asked if we could go back before we go home! That really says everything!
So affordable and staff so helpful lots for kids to do. A all round great day out

Fantastic place for kids. Loads of animals and staff are fantastic. Very welcoming place and prices are great. Soft play for younger children and air cannons for older kids. Small putt and play and kids pedal toys. Views from the top of the farm are great and animals are well behaved and friendly. Well worth a visit
Fabulous farm to bring the kids and Fionnuala and her family made us feel so welcome. Our kids loved it and this is a place u must go to when u visit Donegal :-)

name: Strandhill Campsite
location: 1 Cannon View, Carrowbunnaun, Strandhill, Co. Sligo, Ireland
comments: I would give 5 stars but one was lost due to very ignorant, unfriendly and uninformative staff member at the reception. The young man didn't bother to inform us where is the tent area or toilets, information had to be dragged out of him because he was to occupied with his phone. We got the key fob to open the gate but we wernt informed that this have to be used to open the toilet door, so we had to run in lashing rain to get the fob back from the car. Camp site overall is v clean and have great location. Again one star lost because of the staff member...

Pretty big site. Just rolled up on the day, no booking, 22 quid for 2 people and the camper, we didn't get electric. Beach, bars, ice cream adjacent. Friendly welcome at the reception, very informative. Showers and toilets on site. As well as electricity and water.
Well kept but very big and busy.
We come here to enjoy the history
Its a very nice place 🙂🙂

name: Camping Sleepy Hollows
comments: Nice quiet site with good facilities and very nice helpful owner.   Very pretty.  Good area to walk the dogs. Would recommend, but do take midge repellent in August!

Myself and my wife Shirley have just returned from Sleepy Hollow Camp site and I must say we found the whole camping experience awesome; from the peace and tranquility of the area to the complete hospitality and friendliness of the owners Arthur and Pauline. We could not rate this site highly enough.   Herbert Wright... Aug 2017.
Very pretty in quiet location.  Facilities look rustic but are really quite good. A short walk to Leo's and Tessa's for food, drink and music.
Disappointed! So midgy couldn't sit out could hardly leave camper. Toilet and shower facilities very very basic but clean. Owners lovely people.
Beautiful camp site, simple, charming. Facilities very clean and the owner was very welcoming and helpful.

Directly at the beach. Nice bay for surfing and walking. 
Good facilities and reasonable price.
Beautiful scenery, white dunes and the fantastic ocean, very good facilities, showers are free and very good, laundry is cheap (2€).
Love this camp site well laid out clean facilities.  Great sand dunes.
A wonderful place hidden in sand dunes, camped here in a tent, only cooking facilities are missing.
This site has a fantastic location and the facilities look good. However, we drove away after seeing the pitches available for campervans which are very much in the middle of mobile homes.

name: Derrylahan Hostel

Great location if you want to experience the wilderness, lovely people working her and great owner who has a brilliant laugh.
Outstanding place to be very welcome people at Derrylahan hostel will be back again
Get facilities and lovely people running the place .
Authentic, uncomplicated, great host, wonderful surroundings and inexpensive.

Lovely traditional caravan site. Clean and well maintained. Friendly owners. Will definitely be back.
Brilliant location. Fab café
Lovely friendly owners always have time to stop and talk

name: Boortree Touring & Camping Park
comments: Family run campsite. Friendly staff especially lovely receptionist - Sarah. Very clean. Close to sea. Lovely views. We have stayed here every year since it opened

Small site no play area for children at all very expensive €105 for 3 nights apparently includes haveing to pay €5 electric +€5 for awning god no's What else we were charged for L ong walk to local shop not much in it either positive things  .toilets showers spotless clean and tidy short walk to beach quiet.
Really great site! Small but everything was spotlessly clean and very well looked after. Great location right beside the beach. Perfect for surfing!

The camping itself is very tiny and has no kitchen, spots are small, nothing particularly interesting for people with a tent. Only one general store in walking distance and two overpriced restaurants, that you reach by walking along the beach, which has turned into rally tracks for cars. Huge disappointment.
Small but perfectly formed campsite. Well maintained. Friendly staff. Close to beaches.

name: Camping al rio
location: San José de Suaita, Suaita, Santander Department, Colombia

Muy buen servicio y atención. Ofrece cabaña con habitaciones cómodas. 
Para camping excelente infraestructura de cocina y baños con agua caliente

Bonito lugar y económico, el problema es que no hacen respetar el reglamento a la hora de evitar el bullicio y la toma de sustancias a altas horas de la noche.
No es práctico ir si no se tiene vehículo.
Buenas instalaciones, cuidadas y limpias. Mejor en coche para llegar hasta el pueblo.
Mucha agua
Excelente espacio de camping, muy campestre y en verdad tranquilo..

name: Zona de Camping
location: #9-1 a, Cl. 10 #9125, Villa de Leyva, Boyacá, Colombia
comments: Really nice, confortable and calm

El ambiente en el camping es muy bueno, aunque esto depende de la gente que se hospede en cada momento. Por la noche nos reuníamos alrededor de la fogata a hablar y tocar música. El dueño es correcto. No es barato ni caro. Los baños a veces pueden estar muy sucios aunque creo que era culpa de los huéspedes del momento. No hay agua caliente.
Tratamos siempre d darles el mejor servicio a nuestros visitantes ...ahora con servicio d restaurante y comidas rapidas con los mejores precios..

Hemos ido desde el 2010, años nuevos, velitas, aniversario, etc. Ambiente familiar, no ruido a excepción de algunos amantes, :) pero es un excelente lugar para acampar en compañía de los hijos y familiares.
Buena zona de camping, excelente ubicación a plaza central y restaurantes, con Parqueadero y precio justo. Zona de baños regular.

name: My buddha hostel and camping
comments: hermoso y apacible lugar, contemplación absoluta sobre la naturaleza y el firmamento, espectacular vista sobre la bella villa, hospedaje y camping mas cerca de las estrellas.
2015: Tranquilidad total, dog friendly, parqueadero gratis.
El mejor mirador del pueblo colonial "Villa de leyva", contacto con la montaña,increíble!
Excelente vista sobre el hermoso pueblo de Villa de Leyva.

Tranquilo
Tranquilidad, espiritualidad ambiente natural
El salón de eventos tiene muy buen servicio y al contar con la capilla es una muy buena opción para organizar eventos sociales como matrimonios.

name: Pietra Hotel Santa Campground

Es un lugar donde la naturaleza se reencuentra con el ser humano,
 ademas de gozar con un panorama y una vista a la bella Villa de Leiva a tan solo 10 minutos a pie de la plaza central.
Muy ambles,  linda la vista,  los baños limpios, la comida no es muy buena por el resto super!
Un buen sitio para acampar con un mirador hermoso de la ciudad
Una vista maravillosa, un muy buen lugar para acampar, cuenta con duchas,  baños y Don Alberto es un excelente anfitrión.  Recomendado a 10 min caminando de la plaza principal.

name: Pietra Santa Casa Hotel Zona de Camping
comments: Un lugar muy agradable para acampar, sólo que algo retirado de la parque principal. El ambiente y las hospitalidad fue genial!!
Excelente
Buen sitio para pernoctar

name: Monte Verde Cabañas & Camping
location: Vereda Monte Suárez, sector de la escuela, Arcabuco, Boyacá, Colombia

name: Alojamiento Los Vagones De William
location: Carrera 7, Vereda Centro, Tibasosa, Boyacá, Colombia
comments: Excelente! llevaba unos meses imaginandome como seria...hospedaje en vagones, con la "nostalgia alegre" de recordar epocas de mis Padres..gracias, muy buen servicio, que desayuno más rico !. Bueno...quedo pendiente de llevar a mis nietecitas pues alli hay juegos y demás para ellas, además puedo llevar mi pequinés. Fue una experiencia enriquecedora...buen vino, buenos amigos, y la magia de la nueva propuesta de hospedaje en mi Boyacá del alma. Gracias a su propietario.
Un lugar increíble para estar estar tranquilo y vivir una experiencia inusual pero cautivadora (vagones de tren ). Naturaleza. Dog friendly.  Recomendado 100%.
Es un sitio espectacular para descansar, en familia o muy romántico si el plan es en pareja. Super recomendado.
Buen sitio para descansar y desconectarse del entorno. Excelente servicio y la mejor opción para planes familiares.

Un paraiso en Tibasosa, descanso, naturaleza.
Atencion esmerada y entorno agradable, hacen sentir al huesped  relajado y feliz.

name: Zona de Camping Molino Del Balcón
location: a 11-119, Cra. 12a #111, Villa de Leyva, Boyacá, Colombia
comments: NO lo tomen como opción para camping. El lugar es bueno, pero los miembros de la familia dueña de la casa no tienen la menor consideración con los viajeros. Se mostraron irrespetuosos cuando les solicitamos educadamente que bajaran el alto volumen con el que estaban celebrando a pocos pasos de las carpas. Nos dijeron que esto "era Colombia", que si queríamos podíamos mover las carpas del lugar que ellos mismos nos habían indicado previamente. Cuando nos fuimos, seguían increpando que esa era su casa y lanzaron insultos como "come tierra Argentina", asumiendo que éramos de este respetable país. NO RECOMENDABLE EN ABSOLUTO.
El sitio es grande pero tiene pocos baños y no hay un control con aquellos que no saben convivir con otras personas
Terrible los baños sucios costosos

name: Restaurante El Mezon
location: Restaurante El Mezon, Vado Real, Vado Real - Suaita, Santander, Colombia
comments:
It's a very comfortable place, The best part was the pool, it's clean, fresh and cheap ($6.000 pesos)
and the juice was delicious.
Excelente lugar para descansar un fin de semana
La atención es pésima. Los precios altísimos para la comida ofrecida. En mi tierra que no es Santander me he comido mejores carnes oreadas que las que me ofrecieron y a mitad del precio.
Mala atencion y la comida fria. Para nada recomendable.
Muy buena atención, comida y precios. También hay mirador para descansar un poco del viaje y recargar energía si se va de Bogotá a Bucaramanga o viceversa.

name: Campo Río Cane
location: Km 7 vía Arcabuco, Vereda Capilla,, Villa de Leyva, Boyacá, Colombia
comments: Excelente sitio para acampar,  la atención del anfitrión muy buena.  Tranquilidad, comodidad,  la batería de baños en excelente estado, muy aseado e higiénico. Recomendando!
Excelente lugar para acampar y pasar un rato increíble. Excelente atención, el lugar es muy cómodo y aseado. Muy recomendado!

Excelente  lugar,  un espacio muy tranquilo,  muy limpio ,  y super comodo.   los baños y duchas en un excelente estado!!  y Don camilo  super servicial en todo momento.  es el lugar perfecto para acampar, lo super recomiendo!!!

He tenido la oportunidad de visitar este maravilloso lugar en dos ocasiones! Don Camilo es una excelente persona y el lugar es simplemente perfecto! Totalmente recomendado. Esta cerca al pueblo y también a la periquera ... :)
Excelente lugar

name: Tuloma
comments: Тихое и спокойное местечко.
Сгорело

name: RISTIKENT
location: 72 км. трасса Р12 Кола-Лотта, Кола, Murmanskaya oblast', Russia, 184374

name: Chalet Forest
comments: Просто супер
Я там был КРУТООО!

name: Teremok
comments: Рядом с турбазой есть яхт-клуб
Минус только в туалетах.
Это из сказки

name: Gasthaus Camping Palopaikka Titta Virmanen
comments: Vaatimaton mutta edullinen camping.

name: Lohiranta Holiday Village
comments: La zona è molto tranquilla e rilassante e il personale è molto gentile e disponibile, ma la "Cabin" in cui abbiamo dormito era molto spartana e vecchia. Nonostante fosse per cinque persone la cabin era molto piccola, e i servizi igienici sono molto sporchi, non siamo nemmeno riusciti a farci la doccia! Per il resto la location è suggestiva, consiglio di fare un giro in barca, e si è appassionati pesce il lago di fronte permette di fare Delle belle catture!

Oli taas mukava vierailla Kotiseudulla tässä heinäkuussa,ja perinteisesti yövyimme Lohirannassa, siellä oli mukava ohjelma la.15.7 nimittäin karaokekilpailut,ja yleisökin pääsi laulamaan.Paikan pitäjä, Riitta aina yhtä ystävällinen ja hymyilevä,vaikka känkkä;ränkkä asiakas olikin mukana illassa,(tyytymätön kaikkeen) Saunamökki ja vallankin sauna oikein hyvä,mökissä tieten hiukan niukat toimintotilat,mutta ei se lomamieltä haitannut. Alue on yleisilmeeltään siisti.
Mukava omistaja, alue todella siisti ja mökki edullinen ja kiva.
erinomainen paikka rauhallinen ja ystävällinen ja auttavainen henkilökunta,suosittelen
Mukavasti tuli yöt nukuttua.

name: Abula Campsite (Rmk)
comments: Cosmic landscape around the area. Good place for camping. Full in the middle of the season. Cliff and rocky beach.

name: Kuuli talu puhkemajad
comments: Lovely place in the middle of nowhere. Facilities are simple but very clean. Could use more hooks and sockets. Very friendly and thoughtful host.
Ein wunderbarer Ort mit einem sehr freundlichen Gastgeber (spricht auch sehr gut Deutsch), einer tollen Sauna und vielen liebevollen kleinen Orten im Wald.
Vaikne!

name: Sinima puhkeküla
comments: Puhas, hubane. Kõik vajalik on olemas.
Ihania pieniä ja suuri mökkejä😍

name: Muharanna caravan and camping saaremaa
location: Muha Talu Saaremaa, Camping and caravan. Bed and brekfast, 93330 Saare maakond, Estonia
comments:
Nice place, quiet and pleasant, very close to the sea. Unfortunately, when we were ther on the beaches was an awful stinking sludge ejected from the sea, so we could not stay on the shore. At the beginning we were weird treated by the owner who said that there is no place even for one tent, only for one night, after a long conversation and a reminding of our exchange of emails he agree to our stay. It turned out that besides us, there are 3 cars and a lot of space ... Strange, but after that ok, cheap, cozy, well-kept and pampered camping.

Ładne miejsce, ciche i przyjemne bardzo blisko morza. Niestety kiedy tam byliśmy na plażach było strasznie dużo śmierdzącego szlamu wyrzucanego z morza, więc nie można było zostać na brzegu. Na początku zostaliśmy też dziwnie potraktowani przez właściciela, który stwierdził, że nie ma miejsca na jeden namiot na jedną noc, po dłuższej rozmowie i przypomnieniu naszej wymiany e-maili zgodził się na nasz pobyt. Okazało się że oprócz nas są jeszcze 3 samochody... Dziwne, ale po za tym ok, tanio, przytulnie, kemping zadbany i dopieszczony.

Wir waren da im Juli 2013. Der Platz ist toll gelegen, sehr gepflegt, super nette Gastgeber und ein echter Kontrast zum vom ADAC empfohlenem Camping in Tehumardi. 

Wir haben extra dort die Sachen abgebaut, als wir den Caming Muharanna zufällig entdeckt hatten. Sehr ruhig, nah zum Strand. Guter Ausgangspunkt für Touren im Vilsandi Nationalpark.

name: Mõntu sadama puhkeküla
comments: Peaceful, beautiful remote marina.

name: Marjoniemi Holiday Village
comments: Was not happy with the service in the main building. The place itself is nice and set on nicely looked after surroundings just the poor service lets it down
Very good people!

Ihana paikka ja maisema😊! Kivat retromökit joissa monissa kaksi makuuhuonetta! Kaunis kahvilan terassi ja muutenkin kauniita yksityiskohtia niin ulkotiloissa ja sisätiloissa. Mahtava paikka uida ja saunoa ja ihailla moniväristä auringonlaskua ja luonnonihmeitä. Hyvä palvelu. Aivan ihana pitäjä! Lapset 4v ja 7v nauttivat nurmikoilla kirmailusta ja trampalla hyppimisestä ja uimisesta. Tänne tullaan aina uudestaan☺️!
Posto fantastico con sauna e jacuzzi a un tiro di schioppo dal cottage vista lago
Käytiin viime kesänä 2016. Hieno paikka mutta aamupalaa tarjolla tosi niukasti.

name: Ranna Villa Café
location: Küdema küla, Mustjala vald, Saaremaa, 93622 Saare maakond, Estonia
comments: Excellent quality food and service to hold on prime season. Super fast and delicious food.   Väga tore koht söömiseks!
Toidud üllatasid ja olid maitsvad. Miljöö ja see vaade ... lihtsalt võrratu!
Kohvik merenrannalla vahetus läheduses. Hubane ja avar siseruym.
Хорошее место для отдыха

name: Emolahti Camping
comments: Nice area for tents, modern and clean facilities, friendly staff
Very nice camping, clean showers and kitchen.
Nice venue but redicoulusly unfriendly cleaning staff. Behaved like the place is their property and you're not welcome.

Telttailijalle erittäin hyvä kohde, edullinen hinta, pesu-ja wc tilat siistit, keittiötilassa hyvä varustus sekä sisustettu viihtyisäksi jopa käsikirjasto 😃
Pihapiirissä kotieläimiä, lampaita, kanoja, laama ja pari Aasia jotka tykkäsivät rapsutuksesta.
Baarissa sai vielä kuunnella hyvää karaokelaulantaa.

Tämä OLI meille täydellinen kohde siihen asti että alueelle ilmaantui kaiken maailman viihdehärpäkkeet ja eläimet. Viime vuonna oli järkytys miten puolet telttanurmesta oli aidattu laamoille, jostain oli ilmaantunut laumoittain paarmoja joita ennen ei ollut näkynyt, ja rauha oli mennyttä kun porukkaa sohelsi ympäriinsä erilaisilla kulkupeleillä. Tänä vuonna etsitään uusi telttailupaikka.

name: Hännilänsalmi Camping
comments: Nice campsite with decent facilities, but a bit close to the road so not particularly quiet

Surkea teltanpaikka nurmikon alla heti kivikkoa,kirjautumisvaiheessa ei ilmotettu ettei kaikista raanoista tule juomakelpoista vettä eikä sitä ilmoitettu varoituskyltein ainoastaan keittiössä oli kyltit mistä raanoista tulee juomakelpoista vettä lisäksi mökkien siainti oli parempi ajatellen valtatien meteliä!!!
Upea paikka! Ollaan aiemminkin käyty ja varmasti tullaan vielä useastikin uudestaan, kun Viitasaarella käydään.
Très propre.
Halpa paikka yöpyä. Mökit pieniä mutta ajavat asiansa. Lapsille oli leikkipaikka ja uimaranta.

name: Daissy Holiday Houses
comments: Ihana iso piha, jossa pieni leikkipaikka lapsille trampoliinilla ym. Siisti, tilava ja kodikas huone. Söpö retro kokolattiamatto. Keittiö oli yhteinen muiden kanssa, mutta ei haitannut. Ainoa miinus oli kylpyhuoneesta tuleva(?) vieno kissanpissan haju. Ystävällinen palvelu. Voi vuokrata polkupyörän ja pestä pyykkiä. Lähellä Mändjalan hiekkaranta. Kuressaaren keskustaan 11km.

Suurepärane koht! Nii asukoha kui kõige muu poolest. Hubane ja kodune pesa, kus hea pärast pikki Saareekskursioone puhata. Lastele mänguväljak, grillimis-ja istumisvõimalus. Meri kohe lähedal. 5+ ja soovitan kõigile!
Rahulik ja kaunis koht!
Väga mõnus koht puhkuseks lastega :)
Hind taskukohane, meri lähedal, lahke pererahvas.

name: Niemenharjun Matkailukeskus
comments:
While the owners certainly do not boast of their trophy, this gas-station/motel has been awarded as "the most beautiful service station in world". While the building itself is rather good looking, unfortunately, it does not seem to fit to it´s surroundings very well. The enormous parking area, unemptied trash cans, and ugly signposts outside, spoil the view.  From inside, the station is too small, and feels crammed. 

The service is good, but the selection for products could be larger. The croissants I bought were not fresh anymore.  I have not tried the accommodation services. 

While my review seems to be a bit negative, I will stop there in the future as well. The owners need a price for trying to make things differently and giving an option for the ABC-stations with their hideous architecture.
This place was so nice and clean! Refreshing place to stop by on a roadtrip.

Aivan huippu paikka pitää tauko ja ruokailla.
Ruoka oli seisovasta pöydästä monipuolista,  erityisen hyvää ja maukasta. Sisälsi myös jälkiruoan ja kahvin ja maksoi alle 10 e!!!
Suosittelen💙
Todella ihana paikka 😚Hinta/laatu kohdillaan!  Tanssikuva lähellä ja mökki just oikean kokoinen, pientä säätöä, keittiönurkkauksessa mutta  toimiva! Henkilökunta joustavaa ja palvelu pelaa!
Mahtava paikka. Henkilökunta todella ystävällinen. Gasthousen huone siisti, valoisa, lämmin, täydellinen. Tuhkakuppia kaipasimme gasthousin eteen.Taatusti tullaan toistekkin.

name: Kase puhkeküla
comments: Some Light switches are panic buttons
Good place to relax. Sporting possibilities and sauna. Friendly staff.
Super
Nii mõnusss  ;)
Väga hubane koht!

name: Piibelehe Guesthouse - Pension - Camping
location: Karikakra põik 3, Kuressaare, 93815 Saare maakond, Estonia
comments: Small campground 30 minutes walk from center of Kuressaare. Good facilities (gas cooker, free electricity for charging phones), good pitch for tents, clean, friendly owner. Dog friendly.
Really friendly, clean, quiet, close to the city centre, fast internet. I highly recommend this place.
Small camping. Tidy facilities. Nice host. I got the feeling that host takes pride in keeping the place nice and cozy.
Nice little camp site with very good facilities. Friendly owner. Would stay there again
Great peaceful location,  within walking distance to downtown. The host was very friendly.

name: Mändjala Kämping - OÜ Saaremaa Camp
location: Lääne-Saare vald, Mändjala, 93871 Saare maakond, Estonia
comments: The beach is nice and clean. The cabins could use some refreshments, as they are quite old and run down. Food was ok, nothing special. Luckyly the city is only 10 minutes away.
Ok.

Kõik vajalk on olemas, aga telkimine on 7 euri/öö ja kui tahate auto endaga kämpingusse kaasa tuua, läheb veel 3 euri. Ühesõnaga ei midagi erilist. Rand on ilus ja liivane. Miks maksta raha kui sama elamuse saaks RMK telkimisaladelt tasuta. Siiski hea vaheldus kui oled mitu päeva tsivilisatsioonist eemal olnud.

Kaunis loodus aga kämping ise väga vana ja väsinud. Seinad kostavad läbi, ainult üks võti 5-kohalise kämpingu kohta, ainult külm vesi kraanidest, toitlustus aeglane ja toiduvalik kehv. Kämpingu alal liiva sees palju pudelikorke ja klaasikilde.

name: Tehumardi puhkekeskus
comments:
Very friendly people, nice and clean rooms, can do BBQ and play walleball, swim and much more :) 
Awesome experiance !

Campingplatz mit Recht schönem Gelände, Badesee extrem klein. Meer etwa 400 m entfernt, Strand OK aber das Wasser im Uferbereich stinkt extrem. Leider muss man auch erst etwa 500 m im Wasser waten bis man schwimmen kann.

Spokojnie, jak można było oczekiwać. Płasko, duży teren. 200 m do morza. Fajne miejsca na ogniska i urządzenia do grilla. Pełno atrakcji dla dzieci (place zabaw,  boisko do siatkówki, boisko do piłki nożnej )
Kaunis ja rahulik. Meeldiv perenaine. Suurepärane paik puhkuse veetmiseks. Jäime väga rahule ja kindlasti külastame jälle.

Der Campingplatz ist prima ausgestattet (Strom, Wasser, WLAN am Haus) und liegt windgeschützt im Wald. Das Meer kann fußläufig in fünf Minuten erreicht werden. Kleinigkeiten zum Knabbern können an der Rezeption erstanden werden. Snacks gibt es im dazugehörigen Café.

name: Camping Capfun
location: 28 Rue des Langoustiers Ayguade, 83400 Hyères, France
comments: Lieu sympas calme pour septembre. Accueil professionnel. Avec plage très proche . Sinon aucune circulation voiture dans le camping . Mise à disposition d un caddy.  Donc très agréable pour les familles avec de jeunes  enfants

Camping ne mérite pas les 4 *
Points negatif :
Accueil froid et personnel peu aimable. 
Sanitaire et mobile homme vétuste et non entretenue. 
Pas de mobilier de jardin. 
Pas de piscine. 
Animations et danse du camping a revoir 

Points positive :
Plage a proximité 
Camping piéton
Port et autoroutes a proximité 
Camping ombragé 
Cadre agréable

Camping bien situé à 80m de la méditerranée les sont Bungalows bien équipé petit bémol pas de piscine  aéroport  à proximité un peut bruillant mais ont s'y fait . Dans une végétation très ombragé ont apprécie la fraîcheur et le bien être cite . Bonne humeur et bonne ambiance avec de chouette  annimations même soirée Mousse.

Camping à fuir. Campeur pas agréable. 
Accueille des agréables. 
Pas de suivie niveau animation et payante. 12euro pour une animation c'est cher. 
Apart '' vous pouvez ramener le chariot svp'' on voit personne. 
C'est un 4 étoile mais je dirais plus c'est un 4 dièse. A éviter de urgence

Cadre agréable et verdoyant, bungalow propre et bien équipé
Personnel très accueillant et à l'écoute des problèmes, ils font le nécessaire pour que le séjour ce passe au mieux 
Le camping et ses activités sont de manière générale très "familiale"

name: Camping La Farigoulette - Ciela Village
location: Lac de St. Laurent, 04500 Saint-Laurent-du-Verdon, France
comments:
Beautiful camping. Spacious sites. Enough shade.
In July and August there is a lot of noise because of the organized disco's, karaoke and live music, going on till after midnight. 
Very irritating not only for families with small children but also for those who like their evenings peaceful and quiet.

Very nice and spacious camping. its placed between saint croix and Montpez and nearby Quinto which is a bigger town with a magnific market and two big stores and petrol station. It is also perfect location to move and visit the area which has got very nice and beautifull towns and markets to visit.
Excellent mix of tranquility, cleaneness and amenities all together in a tranquil camping next to a laque. 
Vuil sanitair en koude douches. Kleine staanplaatsen zonder al te veel afscherming. Wel prachtige locatie tussen de bomen en aan het meer, je kan van hieruit met een bootje naar de Gorges varen. Zwembad was klein maar als het rustig is in september wel groot genoeg en bovendien verwarmd. Restaurant was uitstekend. Veel nachtlawaai en grootste tegenvaller was de klantvriendelijkheid van de receptioniste. Dus zeker geen 5 sterren waard (sanitair en receptie) maar locatie en restaurant zijn wel echt een pluspunt.
Camping très décevant!
A notre arrivée nous découvrons notre emplacement  (anciennement un emplacement de parking) en plein soleil, le seul arbre présent était à moitié mort susceptible de tomber. Nous avons évidemment demander à changer d'endroit ce à quoi on s'est vu répondre qu'on ne pouvait rien faire pour nous. Nous nous installons donc puis sous la pression de voisins habitués du camping on vient finalement nous dire à 19h30 que l'on peut nous déplacer sur des emplacements de secours (il y a eu de nombreux secours apparemment ils étaient pleins). Déménagement donc.
Pas d'eau chaude dans les douches la plupart du temps, seule certaines douches l'ont et encore il ne faut pas aller se laver à l'heure des vaisselles. 
L'électricité n'en parlons pas! Quand il n'y a pas de coupures de courant il est tout de même impossible de brancher des plaques électriques ou un barbecue sans faire péter les plombs. Résultat premiers repas froids puis bien obligés de louer un de leur barbecue. 
Ce dernier demandé à l'accueil on me répond qu'il n'y en a plus mais qu'on peut avoir une plancha. Va donc pour la plancha mais au service (et oui on ne vous livre rien sur l'emplacement ici idem pour le frigo que l'on a baladé dans un chariot à travers tout le camping) on nous dit mais non il n'y a plus de plancha mais prenez un barbecue. Super la communication quoi!
De plus ni réseau ni WiFi  (que soit dit en passant est payant au delà d'une heure mais ne fonctionne pas).
Et enfin (bah oui faut bien que ça s'arrête un moment donné) le personnel du restaurant et du snack avaient l'air d'être dérangé de servir les clients.

Seul le lac et le canoë remontent le niveau

En bref on vous vole un bras pour un camping 5 étoiles qui n'en vaut que 2!

name: Camping St. Aygulf Beach
comments:
It is really huge camp place. Showers for sure need some modernization.
In area is a nice and big swimming pool. And also restaurant which is working during a night. Near to camp is a lot of another restauranats. And it is few minutes to sea.

Good location. 

However, the employees at the reception really need a smile on their face. 
Also: I had to transfer my passport to them, but did not get it back.
Fortunally, we asked for it ourselves!
Beauty camp maybe litle bit more cheaper.
Looks amazing, right in the beach!
Super

name: Yelloh village Camping Les Tournels
comments:
Nice place. Generally friendly staff. But - rude staff at the pool. There is nothing that spoils fun more than security or lifeguard staff thinking they own the place.

Also reception closes very early - like 9 pm.

Camping had no ties with the security. Security was a bunch of ex convicts looking to start a fight with basically every teen on the campingplace. Next morning after complaining at the reception the answer was simple: "We can't do anything, the security is not ours."
Very good campsite. Book early.
Massive camping, friendly staff but quite noisy at night.
Great playground and pool for kids and easy ride by bike to the beach. We had a 3 bedroom holiday home that was great.

name: Camping Les Mûres
comments:
Again a very pleasant holiday. Our little family stayed with our caravan again in the foresty part of the campsite, very quiet, very nice neighbours, very large patch. Close to bathrooms etc. but not unpleasantly close. Just this time (we stayed in June 2016 as well) we had a sandy/dusty patch and not grass, therefore it was somewhat dirtier and messier. 
We were already prepared for the lacking toilet seats and brought our own, and could be seen walking with our own toilet seat under the arm to the restrooms. Overall, we were very happy about our very nice, albeit short, stay. 
The beach, however, was not as clean as last time, everyday we found and collected considerably large and sharp fresh glass shards and long sharp wires, which could have been very hazardous, especially to our baby. That was not a happy experience, and we expected the beach to be at least raked periodically for such hazards.

Good for mobile homes, not so good for tents. Our stay would be good if it wasn't because of the ants and the street lantern located right next to our place.

They gave us something for the ants, but they returned the next day.

The facilities where good and clean. 

Overall, I would not recommend this camping for people with tents.

Not a great experience, no privacy on pitches. A bit too rustic. British managed and owned I understand. Marginally cheaper than la marina which is also a disappointment.

At least you can book online, unlike its neighbouring site.

Overall, I think the area of grimaud needs updating and has become a little run down in the last 10 years.

I guess it's why so many French now take holidays in Spain, much cheaper too.

Camping was fine, but not very special. The distance to the showers was very far and we also did not know there was no water at our placement. The restaurant was fine but also not very special. Very good were the people at the reception, very very friendly, with a little joke every now and then! Thank you.

Lovely Stay. We stayed in a tent for 7 nights on a sea view pitch. 
The site was very busy but we weren't impacted by that on our pitch. 
It rained very heavily on one night and we were lucky to be on a raised pitch, many others had floods through their tents and awnings.

name: Camping Le Soleil - Esparron de Verdon - Provence
location: 1000 Chemin de la Tuilière, 04800 Esparron-de-Verdon, France
comments:
That's my second year here, and I just love it. Really nice showers and toilets, awesome view points from all the camp...
CONS : Installing your tent here is really hard due to the ground hardness.
Nothing has changed! Still like in my childhood. Really love this area :)
Lovely spot, awesome facilities and a great atmosphere!

Paradise!

We've been coming to Camping Le Soleil from the UK every year for the last 15 years and are looking forward to coming again this July! We have tried all forms of camping - in a tent prior to the arrival of children, in the wonderful mobile homes when they were babies and we then decided to buy a caravan.  The facilities available for all forms of camping are excellent. Our children love it too and find different things to do each year as they grow.  Swimming in the lake is divine when we're not windsurfing or canoeing, the pizzas in the restaurant are superb and the friendly staff make our stay a joy. Roll on July.......

My family spent three glorious weeks in this little corner of paradise in 2015 and can't wait to go back for more this year.  There's loads to do like swimming in the warm lake, canoeing in the gorge, cycling, walking, great market at Riez, strolling into the village and then boules and nice pizzas in the evening.  Very helpful staff who keep the site clean and attractive.  Excellent showers and toilets.  Highly recommended although we really should keep it a secret.

name: Camping Parc De Pramousquier
location: Chemin de la Faverolle, Quartier de Pramousquier, 83980 Le Lavandou, France
comments: Beautiful place great camping lovely people good resto super
very friendly staff,nice situated,good bar and restaurant ,close to a very relaxed beach,!!

Camping Parc De Pramousquier is een erg leuke terrassen camping. Bij aankomst wordt je geholpen door erg aardig en behulpzaam personeel. Het sanitair is basic maar zeer schoon en alles werkt naar behoren. De plaatsen zijn wisselend van grote en niet allemaal waterpas recht. Aan de bovenzijde van de camping is een mooie ruime plaats voor grote campers en caravans. Vanaf een aantal plaatsen is het uitzicht over de Middellandse zee prachtig.
